home.ready: WELLBE COIN is Ready For You..!!
home.stake: Stake WELB-Swap LP tokens to claim your very own WELB!
home.pro-tip: 🏆Pro Tip: WELB-BNB SLP token pool yields 0.5x more token rewards per block.

modalcontent.p1: With great pleasure we would like to invite you the launch of Welb!
modalcontent.p2: Welb will be the home of our new frontend, and provides an interface for all interactions with the WelbSwap protocol.
modalcontent.p3: Development will be on going, and welbswap will still exist in the interim as we work to get Welb completely polished.
